value:
My brother is unshakable. Yet...there
is something off about him lately.
He seems somehow preoccupied.

They say the Shadow Dragon was
resurrected just outside our borders.$k$pBut Macedon's army is strong...
If it comes to war, we have
nothing to fear.

Soldiers require both harsh training
and adequate rest and nourishment.
Same goes for commanders.

Macedon was founded by freedom
fighters. My brother is said to be the
reincarnation of our first king, Iote.

Forts, castles, roads. Those things
alone can tell you all you need to
know about a country.

I am Minerva. If you are a friend
of $Nf, then you
are my friend too.

For the honor and glory of Macedon,
I will gladly sacrifice everything.

I am Minerva of Macedon.
I will not be taken lightly.

I must do better if I'm to be of any
help to my brother...

Something you chose specifically
for me? I will use it as best I can.

I am Minerva of Macedon. No need
to coddle me simply because I'm
a princess.$k$pIn fact...allow me to demonstrate
some combat techniques I learned
from my brother, Michalis.

...Ah! How long have you been
standing there? If you want to
talk, can it wait? I'm training...$k$p...Do I seem strange to you? Perhaps
I am unlike the princesses you may
have met before...$k$pAs a royal of Macedon I must
project strength, whatever the
arena may be.$k$pAnd having a reputation for being a
hard-nosed knight keeps the suitors
at bay...so I find it suits me just fine.$k$pMy only dreams are to serve as my
brother's right hand and to keep
Macedon and my sister safe.$k$pSo I hope to learn as much as I can
from you while I'm here—to bring
peace to Macedon!
はぁっ！
でぇいっ！
きゃあっ！
貴様…！
Like Michalis showed me!
I'll end this!
Prepare yourself!
I'll do it. You'll see!
Michalis... Maria!
Right.
I am Minerva, Princess of Macedon.
I— You— How rude!
My brother Michalis can skillfully wield both his sword and his wit. And he has a kind heart too.
My sister Maria is still little... So I have to do what I can to protect her!
As long as my brother's around, Macedon will be the greatest country on the continent.
I think Michalis had some kind of argument with Father... I hope everything is all right...
I want to stay by your side and keep learning from you. So I plan to do just that.
Understood.
What would he do?
Let's go!
